00015 class Plugins_Facebook_Public extends Common_Public
00016 {
00017     /**
00018      * @return void
00019      */
00020     function __construct()
00021     {
00022         // Call the Model constructor
00023         parent::__construct();
00024     }
00025 
00026     /**
00027      * @param integer $msgId
00028      * @return void
00029      */
00030     public function like ($msgId)
00031     {
00032         $msgMapper = Message_Mapper::get_instance();
00033 
00034         $msg = new Message_Data();
00035         $msg->setId($msgId);
00036         $msg = array_shift($msgMapper->find($msg));
00037 
00038         $idUP = $msg->getIdUP();
00039 
00040         if (! is_numeric($idUP)) {
00041 
00042             return;
00043         }
00044 
00045         $account = new User_Accounts_Data();
00046         $account->setId($idUP);
00047         $account->setIdU($this->_auth->getUserId());
00048 
00049         $accountMapper = User_Accounts_Mapper::get_instance();
00050         $account = array_shift($accountMapper->find($account));
00051 
00052         if (! $account instanceof User_Accounts_Data) {
00053 
00054             return;
00055         }
00056 
00057         $link = "https://graph.facebook.com/".$msg->getRemoteId()."/likes";
00058 
00059         $mytoken = unserialize($account->getAuth());
00060 
00061         $httpClient = new Zend_Http_Client($link, array(
00062             'maxredirects' => 0,
00063             'timeout'      => 30)
00064         );
00065 
00066         $requestData = array(
00067             'access_token'  => $mytoken["token"],
00068         );
00069 
00070         $httpClient->setParameterPost($requestData);
00071         $response = $httpClient->request('POST');
00072 
00073         if ($response->getStatus() != 200) {
00074         
00075             //error
00076         }
00077 
00078         redirect("","refresh");
00079     }
00080 
00081 }
